title: OpenAI Embedding Function Schema
description: Schema for the OpenAI embedding function configuration

model_name.description: The name of the model to use for text embeddings

organization_id.description: The OpenAI organization ID if applicable

api_base.description: The base path for the API

api_type.description: The type of the API deployment

api_version.description: The api version for the API

default_headers.description: A mapping of default headers to be sent with each API request

dimensions.description: The number of dimensions for the embeddings

api_key_env_var.description: Environment variable name that contains your API key for the OpenAI API
